mods.abstract: NEGROES IN JAIL. Were committed to jail, on the 3d. of September instant, three negro-men. one calling himself Butler, says his age is 24 years, five feet, six inches high, speaks only english, of good appearance; Caesar, aged about 24 years, 5 feet, 10 1-2 inches high, speaks only english, good countenanee when spoken to; Haywood, aged about 19 years, 5 feet, 11 inches high, speaks but english rather downcast look when spoken to, stout built. They say they belong to P.C. Bethels, living about three miles above Pattersonville, in the parish of St. Mary, La. The owner of said slaves is requested to come forward, pay charges and take them away, or otherwise they will be dealt with according to law. CHS. THOMPSON, Jailor. Opelousas, September 17th, 1853.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
